next.description: Next priority after now is complete

add-model-pricing.title: Add GPT-5.2 and Gemini 3 Pricing
add-model-pricing.description: Add pricing configuration for GPT-5.2 and Gemini 3 models to the cost calculator and fix hardcoded Claude defaults

dashboard-blocked-tasks-view.title: Show Blocked Tasks and Dependency Graph in Dashboard
dashboard-blocked-tasks-view.description: Dashboard only shows ready/in-progress tasks, hiding blocked tasks completely. Should show blocked t...
dashboard-blocked-tasks-view.completionNotes: Session 101: Added /api/tasks/blocked endpoint with enriched dependency info, /api/tasks/:taskId/dependencies for per-task graphs. Dashboard shows blocked tasks with visual indicators (red border, pulse animation), blocker tags, expandable dependency tree, and 'View Full Graph' button. Task-graph.html enhanced with blocked panel, blocking chain highlighting, and focus-on-click. All 6 acceptance criteria met. 3027 tests passing.

auto-delegation-phase1-hook.title: Phase 1: Core Hook Infrastructure
auto-delegation-phase1-hook.completionNotes: Created delegation-hook.js + delegation-bridge.js. Hook executes in 51-85ms (target <200ms). Config via delegation-config.json. 26 new tests, 2572 total passing.

auto-delegation-phase2-decision.title: Phase 2: Decision Integration
auto-delegation-phase2-decision.completionNotes: Integrated full DelegationDecider and TaskDecomposer with lazy loading. Enhanced tasks.json lookup with per-task delegationConfig. Added MD5-based decision caching with TTL. 20 new tests (46 total). 2592 tests passing.

auto-delegation-phase3-skills.title: Phase 3: Control Skills
auto-delegation-phase3-skills.completionNotes: Created 4 control skills using agent swarm: /delegate (force delegation with pattern control), /direct (skip delegation), /delegation-status (view active delegations and history), /delegation-config (runtime config changes). All files in .claude/commands/. 2600 tests passing.

auto-delegation-phase4-execution.title: Phase 4: Execution Integration
auto-delegation-phase4-execution.completionNotes: Created delegation-executor.js that bridges /delegate skill to AgentOrchestrator. Generates Task tool invocations for parallel/sequential/debate/review patterns. Updated /delegate skill with execution instructions. 31 new tests, 2631 total passing.

fix-direct-skill-state-check.title: Fix /direct Skill - Add State File Check to Hook
fix-direct-skill-state-check.description: The /direct skill documents a state file mechanism (.claude/state/direct-execution.json) but delegation-hook.js never checks for it. Users running /direct will not bypass delegation analysis. Add state file check at start of hook main().
acceptance: delegation-hook.js checks for state file at startup
Hook exits early when directExecution: true
State file is deleted after processing
fix-direct-skill-state-check.completionNotes: Added checkDirectExecutionOverride() function to delegation-hook.js. Checks for .claude/state/direct-execution.json at hook startup, exits early if directExecution: true, clears file after processing. 10 new tests added.

add-hierarchy-delegation-tracking.title: Add HierarchyManager Integration for Delegations
add-hierarchy-delegation-tracking.description: delegation-executor.js generates Task tool invocations but doesn't register delegations with HierarchyManager. Delegations won't appear in the hierarchy tree in dashboard. Add hierarchy registration when Task tool executes.
acceptance: Delegations register parent-child relationships via HierarchyManager
Dashboard hierarchy pane shows delegation tree
add-hierarchy-delegation-tracking.completionNotes: Added registerDelegationHierarchy() and getHierarchyRegistry() to delegation-executor.js. Registers parent-child hierarchy when delegations are created. Returns hierarchy info in execution result. 8 new tests added.

orchestrator-log-forwarding.title: Forward Orchestrator Console Logs to Dashboard
orchestrator-log-forwarding.description: The orchestrator writes to local .claude/logs/session-N.log files but doesn't POST to the dashboard's /api/logs/:sessionId/write endpoint. Console output (phase changes, task claims, errors, execution summaries) should be visible in the dashboard Logs tab.
acceptance: Create logToDashboard(message, level, source) function in orchestrator
Call logToDashboard for: phase transitions, task claims/releases, errors, session summaries
Falls back gracefully if dashboard not running
Logs appear in dashboard Logs tab with proper formatting
Log level filtering works (INFO, WARN, ERROR)
orchestrator-log-forwarding.completionNotes: Added logToDashboard() function to autonomous-orchestrator.js. Logs to /api/logs/:sessionId/write endpoint. Called on: session start, task claim, task complete, phase transition, session error, swarm safety warnings. 24 new tests added.

auto-delegation-phase5-dashboard.title: Phase 5: Dashboard Integration
auto-delegation-phase5-dashboard.completionNotes: All 4 acceptance criteria verified. 229 delegation tests + 417 hierarchy tests passing.

dashboard-fleet-ui-completion.title: Complete Fleet Management Dashboard UI Features
dashboard-fleet-ui-completion.description: Agent edits for Fleet Lineage panel and Keyboard Navigation failed to apply in Session 72. Need to i...
dashboard-fleet-ui-completion.completionNotes: Session 72: Added #projectCards container, Fleet Lineage panel (fleetLineageSection), View Lineage button, fetchFleetHierarchy(), updateProjectCards(), renderFleetLineage(), enhanced keyboard nav (arrows, 1-9, a/l/m). All 14 E2E tests + 2507 unit tests pass.

framework-phase-gate-audit.title: Comprehensive Phase Gate Audit - Quality & Validation Enforcement
framework-phase-gate-audit.description: Audit the project framework's phase gate system to ensure each stage gate enforces appropriate quali...
framework-phase-gate-audit.completionNotes: Agent swarm audit complete: Documented phase gate definitions (quality-gates.js, phase-inference.js), identified enforcement mechanisms, defined expert reviewers per gate (Strategic Planner, Logic Reviewer, System Architect, Test Engineer, Senior Developer, Review Orchestrator), created PHASE-GATE-REQUIREMENTS.md with full requirements matrix including thresholds (80-90), criteria weights, special checks (architecture compliance, multi-agent sign-off), and parent-child gate enforcement rules.

session-end-hook-reliability.title: Improve Session-End Hook Reliability
session-end-hook-reliability.description: The session-end.js hook sometimes fails to deregister sessions from the dashboard. Possible causes: ...
session-end-hook-reliability.completionNotes: All 6 acceptance criteria verified. Hook has 3 retries with exponential backoff+jitter, 2s stdin timeout, debug logging to .claude/debug/hook-debug.log, file-based fallback (pending-deregistrations/), 33 tests in session-end.test.js, and HookMetrics class (959 lines) with persistence and rolling windows. Circuit breaker and error classification also implemented.

dashboard-tasks-tab-claims.title: Display Task Claims in Dashboard Tasks Tab
dashboard-tasks-tab-claims.description: Update the Tasks tab to show which sessions have claimed each task. Currently tasks display without ownership info. Should show: claimed-by session ID, agent type, claim expiration status. Backend: modify /api/tasks to include claims via getActiveClaims(). Frontend: update updateTasksPane() to render claim badges.
acceptance: /api/tasks endpoint includes claims array mapped to task IDs
Tasks tab shows 'Claimed by: session-X' badge for claimed tasks
Claim info updates via SSE task:claimed/task:released events

dashboard-hierarchy-child-details.title: Add Detail Panel for Child Processes in Hierarchy Tab
dashboard-hierarchy-child-details.description: Explore adding a details side panel to the Hierarchy tab when a child process is selected. Similar to the log detail modal enhancement being built for the Logs tab (double-click to view full details). Should show: child agent metadata, delegation context, task progress, real-time output, parent relationship. Consider reusing the side-panel pattern from Logs tab implementation.
acceptance: Research: Document current hierarchy tab rendering (updateHierarchyPane)
Research: Identify what child process data is available via API
Research: Review Logs tab detail modal implementation for reuse patterns
Design: Specify what details to show (metadata, delegation context, output, progress)
Design: Decide on interaction pattern (click vs double-click, side panel vs modal)
Design: Mockup or wireframe of the detail view

dashboard-comprehensive-audit-fixes.title: Dashboard Comprehensive Audit - Fix Critical Issues
dashboard-comprehensive-audit-fixes.description: Session 96 code review audit identified 23 issues (9 critical, 9 high). Session 97 implemented criti...
dashboard-comprehensive-audit-fixes.completionNotes: Session 97: 6-agent parallel swarm fixed critical path issues. Applied: (1) await initializeCommandCenter() at line 892, (2) addEventListener('log') for SSE named events at line 5964, (3) hierarchy:childAdded SSE broadcast at line 3666, (4) project-key-utils.js translation layer (120 lines). 11 new E2E tests added. 2962 tests passing.

dashboard-audit-remaining-fixes.title: Dashboard Audit - Remaining Issues (Race Conditions, SSE, Multi-Project)
dashboard-audit-remaining-fixes.description: Session 97 fixed critical path (3 items). This task covers remaining 10 verified issues from compreh...
dashboard-audit-remaining-fixes.completionNotes: Sessions 99-100: All 10 issues fixed. Session 99 fixed 8 issues (1.1, 2.1-2.3, 4.2-4.3, 5.1, 5.3). Session 100 fixed remaining 2: (1.3) ORCHESTRATOR_SESSION env var set at orchestrator startup, (1.4) _enforceSessionTypeConsistency() ensures atomic updates. 29 new tests in Session 100, 3027 total passing.

merge-quality-gate-enforcer.title: Merge Quality Gate Enforcer from tax-poa-automation
merge-quality-gate-enforcer.description: Port the QualityGateEnforcer module (ac40dc0) that adds programmatic enforcement of quality gates at phase transitions. Includes coverage validation, forced bypass audit trail, and integration with phase-inference.js, session-init.js, and autonomous-orchestrator.js.
acceptance: UPDATE: autonomous-orchestrator.js - add gate checks in advancePhase()
merge-quality-gate-enforcer.completionNotes: Session 102: Copied quality-gate-enforcer.js (592 lines) and tests (446 lines). Updated phase-inference.js with validateTransitionWithGates(), session-init.js with gate validation in executeTransition(), and autonomous-orchestrator.js with gate checks in advancePhase(). Fixed test path. 27 new tests pass, 3056 total passing.

merge-task-manager-archived-deps.title: Merge Task Manager Archived Dependency Fix
merge-task-manager-archived-deps.description: Port the fix (5b1a38e) for _areRequirementsMet() that checks completed backlog tier for archived dependencies. Previously, tasks with archived dependencies were incorrectly marked as blocked.
merge-task-manager-archived-deps.completionNotes: Session 102: Updated _areRequirementsMet() to check backlog.completed.tasks for archived dependencies. Copied task-manager.dependency.test.js. All tests pass.

merge-orchestrator-race-fix.title: Merge Orchestrator Task Claiming Race Condition Fix
merge-orchestrator-race-fix.description: Port the fix (18aca43) for the race condition where initializeCommandCenter() was called without await, causing task loop to start before taskManager.sessionId was set from dashboard registration.
acceptance: UPDATE: autonomous-orchestrator.js - add await on initializeCommandCenter()
merge-orchestrator-race-fix.completionNotes: Session 102: Added await to initializeCommandCenter() call in main(). This was applied as part of the quality-gate-enforcer merge. All tests pass.

merge-dashboard-session-fixes.title: Merge Dashboard Session Visibility Fixes
merge-dashboard-session-fixes.description: Port the fixes (5c771fb) for dashboard session display issues: sessions showing 'unknown' project, sessions disappearing due to stale timestamps, SSE updates overwriting fresh timestamps, orphaned child sessions, and subtaskLogFile support.
acceptance: UPDATE: global-context-manager.js - fix session project name, stale timestamps, child handling
UPDATE: global-dashboard.html - fix session card display, string task format
Child sessions remain visible when parent ends
merge-dashboard-session-fixes.completionNotes: Session 103: Added subtaskLogFile to orchestrator child session registration, session-registry.js, and global-context-manager.js. Fixed project name preservation (won't overwrite with 'unknown'). Added stale timestamp protection in session updates. Fixed string task format handling in dashboard (3 locations). All 6 acceptance criteria met. 3056 tests passing.

merge-dashboard-enhancements.title: Merge Dashboard Enhancements (File Logs, Browser Auto-Open)
merge-dashboard-enhancements.description: Port the enhancements (2fac868) for file-based log endpoints (for autonomous child sessions with subtaskLogFile) and browser auto-open on dashboard startup.
acceptance: UPDATE: global-context-manager.js - add browser auto-open on startup
File-based log endpoints work for subtask log files
Browser opens to dashboard on npm start
